Text: Suddenly exerting its dominance over a megalopolis,
a mountain had become viral in the world of chaos.
Nobody doubted a rumor of it achieving a dream of climbers at the summit.
Despite the temporary public attention, its true self ended up remaining unrevealed, however.
Its moving terrain made it impossible for challengers to pursue their dream,
especially after the location is colonized by supernaturals that even state force cannot evict.
It's objectively considered quite normal to step back and let it go.
A long time has passed since when another peace was restored.
There comes a boy, who seems not able to hide his pleasure from finding out this exisitence.
He is Kaguo, the protagonist of this series.
How had he fallen out of trend?
What secret strategy he has come up with?
